document_data.name: The Foreshadowing
document_data.mainbody: The '''Foreshadowing''' was a religious event observed by worshipers of [[Ibrandul]], the Lord of the Dry Depths.
document_data.Description: The Foreshadowing occurred only on nights when the clouds covered the new moon, cloaking the land in utter darkness. Ibrandulin's [[priest]]s would emerge from the depths at midnight, enacting the ritual that celebrated their [[god]]'s promise to one day cover all of the land in darkness.
